document.bingtitle: Santa finds kids giving shorter lists in recession
document.webtitle: Santa finds kids giving shorter lists in recession
document.description: Money for the heating bill. Food or a place to live. Maybe ... wanted to buy toilet paper because his mother was taking napkins and paper towels from a fast food restaurant ...
